CustomField.formula: ( EPLI_Risk_Adjusted_Rate__c * ( IF ( ISPICKVAL ( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$500,000"), 0.85, IF ( ISPICKVAL ( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$1,000,000"), 1.00, IF ( ISPICKVAL ( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$2,000,000"), 1.70, IF ( ISPICKVAL ( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$3,000,000"), 2.25, IF ( ISPICKVAL ( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$4,000,000"), 2.70, IF ( ISPICKVAL ( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$5,000,000"), 3.15, 0 ))))))) - EPLI_Risk_Adjusted_Rate__c)
CustomField.label: EPLI Limit Modifier (Adj)
